| Bezold-Jarisch reflex |

The Bezold-Jarisch reflex is a physiological response and not a chemical substance, but I have included it in the table as it is the identified entity related to chemistry in the context of the paragraph. This reflex is named after the doctors who first described it, and it involves various chemical and physiological processes in the body.
